title: 像素冒险
description: 一款充满创意的像素风格冒险游戏，探索神秘世界，打败强大敌人。
instructions: 收集金币，避开敌人，找到隐藏宝藏。
controls: 使用WASD移动，空格跳跃，鼠标点击攻击。

title: 8 Ball Billiards
description: 经典的台球游戏，挑战你的瞄准技巧和策略思维。
instructions: 瞄准并击打白球，按照规则将彩球击入袋中。

title: 拉格多尔弓箭手
description: Ragdoll Archers是一款射箭游戏，配备了弓箭和配备箭头的棍子，带有Ragdoll Physics。火箭在一系列对手方面，同时赢得了升级您的能力和弹药的积分。与您的朋友一起玩两人PVP，或与他们合作以击败一系列敌人！
instructions:
1个球员模式
使用左鼠标按钮控制弓箭手。
使用空格键跳。
PVP模式
玩家1 =使用WASD控制弓箭手和左移以跳跃。
播放器2 =使用箭头键控制弓箭手和右移以跳。
2个玩家模式
玩家1 =使用WASD控制弓箭手和左移以跳跃。
播放器2 =使用箭头键控制弓箭手和右移以跳。

title: 狙击手挑战
description: 狙击手挑战赛是一款高风险的射击游戏，您可以在狙击手完成比赛之前淘汰狙击手，在他们完成激烈的试验之前。使用Sharp Aim对每次射击进行排列，并防止任何人获得最终奖项。通过平滑的控件和详细的3D图形，在这种以任务为导向的经验中，每张镜头都计算在内。
instructions:
正确的鼠标或V瞄准
左鼠或射击空间

title: 桥梁竞赛
description:
Bridge Race是一款竞争性的休闲收集建筑游戏。您可以在其中集砖块物以在竞争对手的同时建桥梁。休闲警惕，因为其他玩家可能会阻止您的进度。从而产生紧张的游戏体验。在这个充满活力的3D世界中和鲜艳的激动人心的测试中首先完成桥梁！

如何参加桥梁比赛
桥梁竞赛是一个简单的游戏。您的目标是收集与您的颜色相匹配的砖块，并使用它们来修复和建筑桥梁。目的是创建一条路径，将您带到下一个收集区域，并最终到达终点线。

您可以通过简单地跑过它们来收集砖块。每个关卡都有不同颜色的砖块，您的设计简单又有趣，并具有微妙的声音，穿过出令人满意的领域。您会遇到幻灯片和电梯等障碍物，在您沿着水平移动时，它们会增加一个有趣的元素。使您更容易收集砖块。

但是要小心其他玩家！他们也在寻找砖块，如果您不小心，您的对手可能会通过在您面前建造桥梁来阻止您的进度。如果您想要获得优势，您可以推开您的桥梁，他们很容易在此过程中掉落砖。如果您不小心，您可能会失去宝贵所有收集物。

在整个游戏中，您会遇到散布在地图上的彩色区域，蓝色会阻碍您前进的敌人并您的使命，而红色会减少您的收集，因此不要踩到它们！相反，尝试收集您的颜色，明智地收集。您将继续前进！
instructions: 使用WASD /箭头键 /继续杆移动。

title: 达尔戈纳糖果蜂窝饼干
description: Dalgona Candy Honeycomb cookie是一个有趣的雕刻挑战，您可以小心地从Honeycomb Cookie中切出设计。凭借经典的达尔戈纳（Dalgona），美国饼干等的水平，您将使用各种曲奇雕刻工具从心中雕刻到动物。拥抱挑战并创造令人愉悦的饼干杰作！

title: Sprunki
description:
Sprunki是一款休闲音乐游戏，可让您制作独特的音景。 Nyankobflolcombine的Incredibox的这种改装版本可为您提供DJ控制，以混合循环，人声，节奏和旋律 - 备受推崇，创造了自己的音乐风格。该游戏具有充满活力的角色和声音，具有充满节奏可能性的完全沉浸式体验。无论您是音乐爱好者还是喜欢尝试尝试，这都是表达创造力的有趣而引人入胜的方式。

如何玩sprunki
Sprunki是一款古怪，超现实的，基于音乐的游戏，将创造力与令人毛骨悚然的曲折相结合 - 是的，根据您的选择，它确实有些令人毛骨悚然。您的目标是组装一个奇怪的独特角色乐队，并通过分配不同的服装和配件来创建旋律。每个自定义都会改变声音，使您可以尝试无尽的音乐组合。

当您制作开朗的合唱团时，游戏开始轻松。从电视头，卫星菜肴和类似美杜莎的人物等化身中进行选择，每个人物都为乐队的独特氛围做出了贡献。选择就是您的全部 - 根据您的选择，有不同的组合可以发现隐藏的音乐，混合节拍或深色的底色。

随着您的进展，游戏会变暗。无辜的旋律变成了令人困扰的音景，而您曾经乔利的化身开始显得被诅咒。开朗的树可能会显示失踪的人海报，并且以前和谐的声音变得不和谐，令人毛骨悚然的视觉片段蔓延。您解锁的阶段越多，游戏就越令人不安，引入了新的刺激性角色。

游戏玩法重点是实验声音，但每个阶段都引入了新的挑战。有些角色几乎没有贡献或拒绝"唱歌"，而另一些角色则变成怪诞的形式。画廊部分戏弄破坏者，在每个阶段之后揭示了乐队成员的严峻命运。

最终，Sprunki结合了节奏游戏机制，恐怖元素和超现实故事讲述。享受创造奇异节拍和有趣且意想不到的转变的随便游戏。关键是要玩得开心！

title: bloxd.io
description:
Bloxd.io是一款IO冒险游戏,具有Minecraft图形和各种游戏模式.游戏模式具有跑酷,沙盒创造力和战斗,具体取决于您选择玩的模式.

如何玩bloxd.io
Bloxd.io是一种沙盒游戏,您可以通过准确的跳跃和动作来驾驶具有挑战性的障碍课程.在生存模式下,您会收集资源,手工艺工具,并抵御敌人以保持生命.可以选择几种游戏模式来开始游戏,每个游戏都面临各种挑战.
instructions:
搬家
换位或双尾w以运行
c,z,\或帽子锁定到蹲下
t或输入聊天
b开设商店
/启动命令
o打开菜单

title: Hazmob FPS
description:
Hazmob FPS:在线射击游戏是一款多人拍摄FPS游戏,每秒都在其中!在不间断战斗中的多个游戏模式中与其他玩家与其他玩家进行比赛.这款第一人称射击游戏非常适合那些寻求一些刺激的人.

如何播放Hazmob FPS:在线射击游戏
熟练的FPS玩家会喜欢Hazmob FPS:在线射击游戏.该游戏具有出色的,干净的3D图形,具有流体和直观的控制系统,可让您快速,战术上操纵.这些地图是为在近距离设置的快节奏战斗而设计的,使其无法进行纯粹的反射和技能来完成工作.

升级武器

该武器收集是广泛的,SMG,攻击,shot弹枪,狙击手和LMG类别中有55多种可自定义的武器.该游戏具有出色的进度,使您可以在升级时解锁新武器和附件.您可以适合示波器,皮肤和钥匙扣,并升级您拥有的每支枪的能力.

赚更多的装备

除武器外,您还可以配备服装物品以改善基本角色统计数据.为了访问这些其他物品,您还需要使用您从战斗中赚取的货币购买它们.完成每日和每周的任务,以赚更多的钱,以投入您的新装备.

创建自定义匹配

凭借创建自定义游戏的能力,您还可以与朋友与竞争对手氏族进行私人比赛.竞争等级系统跟踪最佳氏族,显示奖杯和XP分数,以增加竞争的额外元素.

玩各种游戏模式

想直接进入动作吗?单击快速战斗,并在八个可用地图之一上玩一个随机游戏.您还可以玩其他一系列游戏模式;这些都是:

团队死亡竞赛
搜索和销毁
捕获标志
统治
所有人免费
消除
枪支比赛
instructions:
wasd =移动
空间=跳跃
左鼠=射击
右鼠标 / v = aim
P =排行榜,暂停和设置
g =拿起枪
C =蹲下
shift =运行
1,2,3 =开关武器
4,5,6 =技能
E =替代技能
问=替代技能

title: Super Star Car
description:
Super Star Car is a driving Formula 1 racing game that puts you in the driver's seat of high-speed action with a vast selection of cars and iconic circuits. Start your career as a professional racer and climb the ranks through thrilling campaign races, upgrading your car to enhance performance along the way. With simple controls that let you navigate sharp corners effortlessly, stunning 3D graphics, realistic engine sounds, and customizable camera views, the game offers an immersive and adrenaline-packed experience.

How to Play Super Star Car
Super Star Car is all about speed, precision, and strategy as you race through an exciting career mode. Every time you finish a race in this mode, you'll earn stars and money, helping you climb the leaderboard and unlock new opportunities. Use your winnings to upgrade your car strategically, boosting its performance and ensuring that every race feels fresh and thrilling.

The game features several tracks, each with its own unique challenges. You can select from iconic maps such as Arcport Circuit, Yafield Park, Riverside Circuit, and many more. Each track will test your skills, particularly when it comes to navigating those sharp curves. As expected, corners are the most challenging part of the game—you'll need to hold your steering steady to maintain control. If you find yourself off the track, simply press the space bar to reset and get back into the action.

To aid your racing strategy, there's a mini-map in the bottom-left corner of your screen, giving you a sneak peek at upcoming turns and obstacles so you can prepare ahead. Keep an eye on your speedometer, located at the bottom-right corner, to adjust your pace and avoid spinning out on tight bends.

One of the standout features of Super Star Car is its multiple view modes. You can race from a bird' s-eye view, chase your car from behind, or fully immerse yourself in the action by switching to the driver's seat view. This versatility lets you experience the game from different perspectives, adding to its excitement and variety.

The heart of the game lies in its career mode, where every win brings you closer to the coveted championship trophy. It's not just about crossing the finish line first; it's also about improving your car with carefully chosen upgrades. A better-performing car will help you dominate tougher races as you progress through the campaign.

Get ready to tackle adrenaline-pumping tracks and outmaneuver your rivals.

More Games Like This
If you love the thrill of F1 driving, head over to our driving games where you'll find top titles like Moto X3M, a game that combines high-speed thrills with a test of precision and timing across 22 adrenaline-filled levels; PolyTrack, a fast-paced, low-poly driving game featuring thrilling loops, jumps, and high-speed action where every millisecond counts or Mr Racer, a thrilling racing game in our driving category in which you zoom through busy streets in various locations
instructions:
W or up arrow to accelerate
AD or left and right arrow keys to steer
C to change camera view
Spacebar to respawn position
Xbox Controller supported

title: Racing Limits
description:
Racing Limits is a racing game that lets you push your skills to the max. Race and overtake vehicles in city and highway traffic with four thrilling game modes: carrier, infinite, against-time, and free mode. Choose between one-way and two-way traffic, and experience three times of day - 'Morning,' 'Sunset,' and 'Night.' With multiple camera angles, sensitive controls, and realistic physics, it's a high-speed adventure you won't want to miss. Customize, upgrade, and take on numerous race events in this graphically stunning racing world!

Release Date
March 2018 (iOS)
April 2018 (Android)
November 2023 (WebGL)
instructions:
Up arrow key to accelerate
Down arrow key to decelerate
Left and right arrow keys to steer
C to change the camera view
F to use nitro
E to horn
W to gear up in manual gear mode
D to gear down in manual gear mode
ESC to quit current progress

title: Knock and Run: 100 Doors Escape
description: Knock and Run: 100 Doors Escape is a fast-paced arcade game where you race through hotel corridors, ringing doorbells and pulling off hilarious pranks. But be careful—residents react unpredictably, and trouble is always around the corner. Outsmart everyone, stay on the move, and see if you can become the ultimate trickster without getting caught!
instructions:
Use WASD, arrow keys, or drag the screen to run
Space to start

title: Holey.io Battle Royale
description:
Holey.io is a battle royale game where you consume various items and opponents with smaller holes. You will grow bigger as you swallow! The map will continuously shrink, forcing players into a narrower environment until there is only one person left standing. Consume, grow, and become the last hole standing in the arena!

Once you've become the ultimate hole, check out some more popular .io games like Cubes 2048 and Agar.io!
instructions:
PC
Move mouse = change direction
Hold left-click / space bar = speed up
Mobile
Drag = move
Click the on-screen button = speed up
